Package cs2030.simulator

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2030.simulator.Server
  • public abstract class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class representing a Server object that can serve customers in the simulator.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Customer currCustomer  
      protected java.util.Queue<Customer> customerQ  
      protected int id  
      protected int maxQLength  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      protected Server​(int maxQLength)
      Constructor for an indexed (from 1) idle server who can serve and waitlist customers up to (maxQLength) number of waiting customers, for use by concrete sub-classes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void back()
      Puts Server back in service.
      boolean canServe()
      Returns true if server is not resting and is able to serve a new customer immediately (no customer queue), false otherwise.
      boolean canWaitList()
      Returns true if server (which may be resting) is able to have a customer on waitlist, (customer queue still has vacancy), false otherwise.
      void clearCurrent()
      Clears the spot for a new customer to be served by server, invoked when server finishes serving a customer.
      Customer getNextCustomer()
      Retrieve the next customer in the customer queue.
      boolean hasShorterQThan​(Server other)
      Checks if this server has a shorter customer queue than given server.
      boolean hasWait()
      Returns true if there are customers in the queue waiting to be served.
      void rest()
      Puts Server to rest.
      void serve​(Customer customer)
      Serve given customer immediately.
      void serveNextCustomer()
      Serve the next customer in the customer queue.
      abstract java.lang.String toString()  
      void waitList​(Customer customer)
      Add given customer as waitlisted customer by adding customer to customer queue.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        protected Server​(int maxQLength)
        Constructor for an indexed (from 1) idle server who can serve and waitlist customers up to (maxQLength) number of waiting customers, for use by concrete sub-classes.
        Parameters:
        maxQLength - maximum length of customer queue that can be handled by this server

    • Method Detail

      • canServe

        public boolean canServe()
        Returns true if server is not resting and is able to serve a new customer immediately (no customer queue), false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if able to serve a customer immediately, false otherwise

      • canWaitList

        public boolean canWaitList()
        Returns true if server (which may be resting) is able to have a customer on waitlist, (customer queue still has vacancy), false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if able to waitlist a customer, false otherwise

      • serve

        public void serve​(Customer customer)
        Serve given customer immediately.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer to be served

      • serveNextCustomer

        public void serveNextCustomer()
        Serve the next customer in the customer queue.

      • waitList

        public void waitList​(Customer customer)
        Add given customer as waitlisted customer by adding customer to customer queue.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer to be waitlisted (added to the queue)

      • clearCurrent

        public void clearCurrent()
        Clears the spot for a new customer to be served by server, invoked when server finishes serving a customer.

      • hasWait

        public boolean hasWait()
        Returns true if there are customers in the queue waiting to be served.
        Returns:
        true if there are customers waiting in the queue

      • getNextCustomer

        public Customer getNextCustomer()
        Retrieve the next customer in the customer queue.
        Returns:
        next customer in the customer queue to be served

        Puts Server to rest.

        Puts Server back in service.

        Checks if this server has a shorter customer queue than given server.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
